name: Robot Tower
description:
A little robot is found at the bottom of an infinite tower after years of malfunction.

Unfortunetaly, only leg servomotors are still running, the robot is unable to move by itself but can jump around.

With your magnets you will be able to help this little guy and perhaps you will be able to collect some treasures on the way! Who knows?

----------Game Made for the (Wild) Box Jam #1 a private 48 hours Jam

Left mouse button to move left

Right mouse button to move right 

Scroll to adapt the power of your magnet

Space to jump with the robot

And Escape to exit the game

The goal was to make a platformer game with multiplayer support and only space key and mouse are available.

Made with Unity, Asesprite
